phrases: when I was going to community college.
He went to a pretty upper-rank college in the area,
and my friends were envious because he was quiet and cool,
so I went out with him to feel superior.
Because it is three times the speed, the picture quality's...
My husband's not a bad man.
It is not as if he drinks a lot,
and even though he does not earn much,
I am a woman who married without ever knowing love.
He only knows the words food, bath, and sleep.
I was really busy today, so that is all there is.
But it is your favorite, is not it?
If you have the guts to get mad, then get mad.
I am sure you are just going to eat your dinner silently as usual, though.
brought to you again today by your neighbor, Kai Harada.
How is your evening going so far?
Here is a perfect song to end the day...
Fifteen minutes by car from Morioh Station...
His house was in the villa and resort area.
Rather, it was Yoshikage Kira's house when that was still who he was.
He has now gained a new face, family registry, job,
and a different place to call home.
I am sure he will never try to come near here again.
There are not any corpses in the fridge, are there?
But we had to search the place.
Because now that he is someone else,
the only clues we could possibly find on him would be in this house.
Born in Morioh Town on January 30th, 1966.
His height is 175 centimeters, weight is 65 kilograms,
and his blood type is A.
He was born to parents of advanced age.
His father, Yoshihiro, died of illness when Yoshikage was 21,
and his mother died of old age not long after.
In 1988, he graduated from D Academy's Department of Literature.
That same year, he started working for S City's Kame Yu department store.
He transferred to the Morioh branch in 1993.
It is impossible to find him using fingerprints, teeth, or surgery scars.
That is all rather vague information.
High School Music Recital Violin 3rd Place Yoshikage Kira
Middle School Track Meet 200 Meter Hurdles 3rd Place Yoshikage Kira
He definitely was not the school hero.
Award Grade School Writing Contest Overall 3rd Place
And it is hard to tell what he was good at.
Even in this photo, he is positioned so he does not stand out.
No one envied him or ridiculed him...
He is a man who does not show his strengths or weaknesses to anyone.
Of course, all this was deliberate.
He was hiding his high intellect and abilities.
He knew that was the best way to stay out of trouble.
I came here hoping we could possibly find one of his hobbies, but...
he seems to have kept several jars in a drawer.
It looks like some sort of scrapings in them.
What do you think they are?
They appear to be nail clippings.
No, they are his own nails.
They are not from his victims.
He is kept very meticulous data in his notebook.
You mean the numbers on the jars?
Does that mean he is been collecting them since 1983?
Thumb Index Finger Middle Finger Ring Finger Pinky
Does this mean that in 1983, his thumbnail on
1983 was the year Reimi Sugimoto was killed.
The records begin in that year.
where he could not contain his murderous instincts any longer.
He is got his toenail lengths on the next page!
I guess we have discovered the odd hobby
of a man who tried to convince others that he was boring.
Years that my nails grow more than 30 cm I am on a roll!!
Jewish merchants observe the movement of sunspots
to determine how well their businesses would do.
It appears Yoshikage Kira used the length of his nails
to determine the condition he was in...
Whether he was in condition to kill, of course.
As of June, they have already grown more than 20 centimeters this year!
He is insane, that sick bastard!
But this is not a clue we can use to track him.
Does this mean someone else is in this house?
Does that mean he is working with someone else?
Crimes can be traced from interactions with others.
A partner could possibly rat him out.
He is not the type to trust anyone.
He is in the picture, right behind us!
Does that mean he is a ghost?
Considering the case of Reimi Sugimoto,
it is possible that his father also could not pass on
to the next world and is stuck here as a soul's energy.
He looks like he wants us to get the hell out.
Are you trying to scare us with your ghost energy?
But this is all the more reason we cannot leave.
Hurry up and answer the phone, you slowpoke!
You think I look like I want you to leave?
It is the opposite, you moron!
My face is saying that I am never letting you leave this house!
Anyone who goes after my son must die.
You know about your son's crimes?
Get out here, you geezer ghost!
It appears Kira's father has been present from the start.
He is moving around in the picture.
He is calling us from inside the picture.
He probably threw the receiver from within this picture, too.
I will kill anyone who goes after my precious son!
We can attack ghosts with our Stands!
Rohan-sensei used his Heaven's Door to read Reimi's memories!
Any damage to the photograph will come back to us!
Hurry up and fix it, Josuke!
We are going to blow to pieces!
the same kind of power that my son has!
Use The Hand to cut just the old man out of the picture!
Why did I run straight into the window?
M-My hands are coming out all the way over there!
I cannot come past this point!
There is a wall here that we cannot see!
That is the frame of the photo!
It may look like you are in the room, but you are actually not.
I am a ghost that lives within a photograph...
I can control the dimension of any photograph that I appear in.
Because I can trap the energy of others' souls in photos, using the camera!
That room is inside the picture!
If you damage the photo, your soul's energy will be hurt,
and the damage will come back to you, as well!
But it is right in front of me!
If you are as dumb as you look, you do not need to think about it too hard.
After I kill these two, I will trap the two of you and slice you up!
Do something with your invincible Star Platinum!
It appears impossible to stop the old geezer's attacks.
If all the damage is just going to come back to us,
then even if I stop time with Star Platinum, we will not be able to do anything.
When something is useless, I give up.
What the hell are you talking about?!
I have given up on stopping the geezer,
If he controls any photograph he is in,
then maybe all we have to do is take a picture of him by himself, so he is alone.
To think you have evaded my attack...
Y-You did not scare me at all, you idiot!
You guys are clearly used to fighting.
You must have fought against people with the same kind
of power as my son many, many times!
He can get out, since he is a ghost.
We need to make sure you stay in there and keep quiet.
There is something in this house that will cause him a lot of trouble if we find it.
That is why you attacked us.
So if you fold him in half, there is no exit.
Okuyasu, Koichi, you two search this room.
We will search the right side.
I cannot protect my son now!
If that falls into their hands...
Still, what thing that might cause trouble for him should we look for?
I am not thinking too much about it.
If Kira's old man there turns pale, it is a good sign.
Please, just a little is fine.
Just open the tiniest of holes in the tape and let me breathe...
Hey, Koichi, he is just acting.
He is trying to get you to open a hole so he can escape.
Y-You may not believe me, b-but I really cannot breathe!
I am claustrophobic, so I understand how that feels...
You want us to open up a hole that bad?
I will open up plenty for you...
Let me out of here, you stupid little brat!
Now you have shown your true colors.
I will not be removing those tacks.
I cannot see, but I appear to be on the post right now.
I have got a great idea!
Your tacks helped me come up with a trump card to get out of here!
It is all thanks to you!
I think he might have run away!
H-He used the tacks and did something!
You have been fooled, you moron!
Looks like I have won the battle of wits.
It is the bow and arrow...
The bow and arrow should be in safekeeping at the Speedwagon Foundation...
This arrow drew Deadly Queen out of Yoshikage!
The arrow is the important part!
I will never let you have it!
Use Act 1 to go after it!
The thing that Kira's father did not want us to find was the bow and arrow!
He was just a stronger opponent.
You can tell that Kira is definitely his son.
We have lost to that family's determination
to never give up, and to survive, no matter what.
As long as they do not get this arrow, that is good enough.
I am going to use this to make more enemies for you!
I thought there might be more than one set.
Now I know exactly how DIO and the others
were able to gather so many Stand users in such a short amount of time.
They created more of them around the world
with a number of those bows and arrows.
I am assuming Kira's father got this set from an old woman named Enyaba,
also got hold of one, and came to this town.
Because Stand users attract other Stand users, apparently.
Yoshikage, where are you right now?
You never could help but kill women, even when you were a boy.
But if that is what brings you happiness, I will protect you.
You are my one and only son.
I-I mean, I did not know you even knew how.
You are telling me to eat your cooking?
And did not you cut them last night?
Were you crying all night at the top of that tree because you could not get in?
What gives you the right to shut the window near the tree?!
I have told you day after day not to shut it!
Why are you so worked up?
I shut the window without thinking.
I will not do it again.
He started cooking out of the blue last night,
and he is using an actual blade rather than an electric razor to shave.
Blades always give him razor burn...
Hey, you have not paid your rent from last month.
It is now 260,000 yen including this month's.
Hurry up and bring it from the safe.
You are the only one who knows the combination to the safe!
Thank you for coming so early in the morning, sir.
But I seem to be a bit short on cash right now.
You got in over your head when
you tried to rent my wonderful house with your lousy income, you peon!
You need to learn to live within your means!
Um, we will get it right away
Please do not get the wrong idea.
When I said I was a bit short, look.
I meant that I only had a little over 500,000 yen.
I will only be able to pay for this month,
last month, and the next two months in advance.
You must have stolen that money from the landlord.
I do not know how you did it,
but you stole it from his bag, did not you?
I am sure in most cases,
people would fear him and think that he is just a low-life...
But my husband's actions... him stealing that...
For the first time, after years of living with him,
I think he is so romantic...
